H0.text: what region did the incas live in. Peru

H1.text: what region did the incas live in. Bolivia

H2.text: what region did the incas live in. Ecuador

H3.text: what region did the incas live in. Cusco

A4.text: At its height, the Inca Empire included modern-day Peru, what are today western and south central Bolivia, southwest Ecuador and Colombia and a large portion of modern-day Chile, at the north of the Maule River.

A5.text: The administrative, political, and military center of the empire was in the city of Cusco.

A6.text: Inca Artifacts, Peru and Machu Picchu
